text.text_translated: I am a member of the Campaign to Stop Killer Robots. The Campaign to Stop Killer Robots is a group that works to stop weapons that can kill without humans. Forget the scary movie picture of a Terminator crushing people. Look at what is happening now. Military machines like drones and gun turrets already kill people. They do this with only a small amount of human control. The next step could be autonomous murderbots. Autonomous murderbots are robots that can decide who to kill on their own. These robots follow orders, but they can still decide for themselves who to kill. This is clearly not right and it is dangerous for people, so we must be very careful about what we ask machines to do.
